title: AB de Royse777
author: AB de Royse777
created_time: November 18, 2022, 12:38:08 PMLast edit: November 24, 2022, 06:48:56 PM by Royse777
content: Main site is https://sinbad.io (bitcoin mixer, the site in fully functional and they are running a signature campaign already on bitcointalk)Since the current design looks very poor, my client already hired a front end developer to redesign the site. It's in progress and can be seen on here: <sill be shared on PM>Now, we are looking for someone who will be very professional to apply the current functionality (sinbad.io) to the new design and install the entire site again on the main domain. If you have done such work before (it does not have to be a mixer only) and have huge experience in web development, then please contact me.Let's discuss how much it will cost and if the client agree then I will secure your payment before starting the job.

If you have done such work before (it does not have to be a mixer only) and have huge experience in web development, then please contact me.Let's discuss how much it will cost and if the client agree then I will secure your payment before starting the job.Hi Royse,I'm a Fullstack developer, majorly work with Crypto based projects. I checked sinbad site, I can understand that it is a Bitcoin multi sender kind of project. If you share more details about the tech stack used for building the current version, I can give you a quote on the same.You can check my past works here: https://github.com/TrasherTravis
